attributes.action: Death penalty reintroduced for child killers
attributes.additional_details: I hereby ask that the government reintroduces the death penalty for anyone that purposely kills a minor with 100% evidence leading to a conviction the public hear too many stories of babies children getting killed and the perpetrator getting a few cosy years inside this is not acceptable i would like all people to imagine what they would feel if it was there child/ family member and how they would personally like to deal with it, parents should be able to let there children play in the street and not worry this has to come to an end as the saying goes an eye for an eye and a tooth for a tooth
